page.title: 04Tilstock School.
page.content: There are 50 pupils and three teachers at the school at present.In school there are 3 classrooms,a paintroom,a kitchen,a playroom and a staffroom. Built in 1914 the school is 71 years old and is situated inthe middle of the village and is quite near the Church,the village shop and the bowling/tennis club.The school has a large sports field and a yard with a netball court.Most of the children live in the village,many come by car others cycle or walk to school.School meals cost Â£3.00 per week,a popular meal is chips,fish,peas or beans.We have a choice of 3 main courses fish,cheese or meat,sweets include ice cream,yogurt,iced cakes,fruit pies or tarts.The exterior of the school is red brick withblack and white gable ends under a slate roof.
